name: potato grading | potato grading | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/30467/documentation

This dataset models the grading process of 1 kg ungraded potatoes.

The activity starts from the agricultural field foreseen to be processed.

This activity ends with potato planting. The dataset includes the diesel fuel consumption and the amount of agricultural machinery and of the shed attributed to the field work. It was also taken into consideration the amount of emissions to the air from combustion and the emission to the soil from tyre abrasion during the work process. Demand on machinery, buildings (shed) and electricity for potato grading and weighting.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0163:Post-harvest crop activities

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The inventory is a copy of the geography of Switzerland. Data quality indicators were adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The inventory uses a potato grader and a weigh.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The dataset is modeled for agricultural production system in US. Data Quality indicators are adjusted accordingly. The inventory uses a potato grader and a weigh.
